answers.answer: I'm 22 weeks and I want to meet my daughter so bad I just want to hold her for the first time already!!!!!
I'm 31 weeks on Thursday and I'm just the same!! I was told on weds I have gestational diabetes and I might be induced early so she doesn't get too big!! So excited is it your first too?? X
@ Gsyoung l want to hold mine already to! lol@amymace I hope all goes well if you do get induced (:&' yes my first baby so excited and nervous
I just went 29 weeks today and I'm so impatient I'm dying to meet her! When I see other people with there little babies I'm so jealous that I have to wait another 11 weeks!!
Im 33 weeks and counting down the days...im having a little boy and cannot wait to meet him I get more excited with every kick :-D

question: I'm only 29 weeks but I wanna meet my baby already !!! But till then I have to wait . :(Anyone else like this? Lol
title: So impatient Lol
